Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the current attribute of a ModifyAttribute request payload.
        """
kwargs = {'current_attribute': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The current attribute must be a CurrentAttribute object.', payloads.
    ModifyAttributeRequestPayload, **kwargs)
args = payloads.ModifyAttributeRequestPayload(), 'current_attribute', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The current attribute must be a CurrentAttribute object.', setattr, *args)
